messages.name: Katharina_Hagg
messages.content:
TODAY AT HAUS DER STATISTIK:

5th Birthday of the Burner Embassy Berlin â€“ Today!
Dear Burners, neighbors, and friends,

Just two more days until our 5th birthday at Haus der Statistik! Weâ€™re so excited to celebrate with you Saturday 4pm-10pm.

Feel free to bring something for the potluck buffet and join in on our activities. Your contributions will make this celebration truly special!

Our highlights include:

art (beginning with action painting with Karlo this evening (Friday))
Burner Bingo
Firespinning
A wintry photo station
Mulled wine and more
Come join us and celebrate together! Inside it is warm!

Welcome Home! - Burner Embassy Berlin, Container village OTTO, Haus der Statistik, Otto-Braun-Strasse 70, 10178 Berlin

https://www.vereinonline.org/Berlin_Burner_eV/?veranstaltung=109294

Berlin Burner e.V.
https://www.vereinonline.org/Berlin_Burner_eV/

messages.name: MandyBGT
messages.content:
You will have everything you'll need, its fully furnished.
The deal is, please just write me a message where you introduce yourself a bit, like what you do, what your hobbies are, why you are looking for a flat, if the time frame of 3 months works for you and then basically we just find a date when you can come by and take a look at the flat :))

I will actually already leave on the 22nd of December, so if you want to move in earlier you can. I wont charge extra for it :)

Looking forward to meet you and talk to you soon!

Hugs,
Amanda

messages.name: MandyBGT
messages.content:
Hi Loves ğŸŒ¸

To make this post understandable for everyone, I will write it in English, but I also speak German :)
I am subletting my beautiful single room flat for 3 months (Jan - March), as I will be travelling during that time!!
The full rent is 600 Euro and itâ€™s 39 m2, I can give you a breakdown when we meet.

The flat is a Neubau, very well isolated and it comes also with a balcony, basement, big windows, a bathtub , floor heating and some instruments (piano, electric guitar).
I also have many plants, so it would be great if you could take good care of them while I am gone :)
You also have heaps of supermarkets just around the corner.
Please also check if the address works for you (NiederschÃ¶nhausen, Pankow)  before you write me a message. Its a bit more far out, but super chill and quiet. And with public transport you can reach everything quite well. It takes me 40 minutes to get to Alexanderplatz and only 30 minutes to Prenzlauer Berg.

messages.name: locally_cartesian
messages.content: I'm also flying by the seat of my pants and figuring things out as I goâ€¦ ^^' I only know of adxs.org for ADHD, not of similar resources for autism yetâ€¦ and similar problem as aboveâ€¦ stuff is too complicated to figure out on my own, so I don't get support yetâ€¦ ^^'

messages.name: mesaoptimizer0
messages.content: Thank you very much. If you have a detailed document or a list of links to know more about this, please PM me

messages.name: locally_cartesian
messages.content:
- disability / disadvantage compensation
- you can still get therapy as support (e.g. ergotherapy to help improve some problems if you need), and likely paid (partially or full) by the social welfare office
- potentially "Schwerbehindertenausweis" (disability pass?) â€“ autism generally gets you 30% (or much more), if you have some other problems you can get beyond 50%; even without, e.g. at just 20% or so, it means tax reductions
- lots of things you might be able to apply for â€“ Eingliederungshilfe, persÃ¶nliches Budget, Hilfsmittel, â€¦
etc.

messages.name: mesaoptimizer0
messages.content: What benefit would you get by an autism diagnosis though? There's no autism medication afaik
